pr_title: scheduled_message: Indicate scheduled messages in conversation views.
pr_body:
These changes adds a new scheduled message indicator in conversation views which informs the user of the number of messages that are scheduled to be sent to the current view. This indicator is also filtered to exclude messages that has been failed to be sent to provide an more accurate indicator of scheduled messages to be sent.

Fixes: #25584.
